title: New NBA mock draft, two days before Round 1: Latest buzz on the chaotic top-10 picks
content: Will the 76ers, Hornets and Jazz take best-player-available approaches? We project both rounds of the NBA draft.

title: Pacers confirm Haliburton has torn Achilles
content: Pacers star Tyrese Haliburton sustained a torn right Achilles tendon in Game 7 of the NBA Finals against Oklahoma City, the team confirmed on Monday.

title: 5-year sentence sought for Franco; verdict Thu.
content: Dominican prosecutors have asked a judge to sentence the Rays' Wander Franco to five years in prison for alleged sexual abuse of a girl who was 14 at the time. A final decision in the case will be issued Thursday.

title: Sources: Wiz's Middleton picks up $33.3M option
content: Wizards three-time NBA All-Star Khris Middleton has picked up his $33.3 million player option for the 2025-26 season, sources told ESPN.

title: Reds DFA Candelario halfway through $45M deal
content: The Reds reinstated infielder Jeimer Candelario from the injured list Monday and designated him for assignment.

title: Bradley win 'opens the door' as playing captain
content: After winning the Travelers Championship, will Keegan Bradley be a playing captain for the U.S. at the Ryder Cup in September? That's a decision only he can make.

title: Guerrero takes lead at 1B in AL All-Star voting
content: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. of the Toronto Blue Jays jumped ahead of seven-time All-Star Paul Goldschmidt of the New York Yankees for the top spot at first base in the American League as Stage 1 of Major League Baseball's All-Star Game balloting nears en end.

title: 'We are Vegas' team': A's begin building stadium
content: The A's on Monday celebrated the groundbreaking of their new $1.75 billion, 33,000-person capacity ballpark in Las Vegas that is expected to be finished in time for the 2028 season.

title: Durant deal, Haliburton injury shake up title odds
content: The Rockets' trade for Kevin Durant and the injury suffered by the Pacers' Tyrese Haliburton shook up the early odds to win next season's NBA title, but the clear-cut favorite remains the champion Thunder.

content: When the Thunder set out to build a champion, they learned hard lessons from how their historic trio of KD, Russell Westbrook and James Harden flamed out a decade ago.

content: The most dynamic division in baseball has been tons of fun so far. After 17 games in 18 days, here are five lessons.

content: While the world watched the Finals, the league's hierarchy shifted. Is OKC already looking over its shoulder ?

content: The Suns and Rockets have agreed to a deal that lands Kevin Durant in Houston. Which side won the trade?

content: Sami Whitcomb and Laeticia Amihere are positioned to produce for their teams and fantasy managers ahead of a busy week in the WNBA.

title: Why empty seats litter Club World Cup, Gold Cup
content: Little more than a week into the summer of soccer, and some of the defining images of the Club World Cup and Gold Cup have been seas of empty seats.

title: Wrexham legend Paul Mullin leaves club on loan
content: Paul Mullin, the poster boy of a Wrexham team soaring through England's football leagues following their takeover by Hollywood celebrities, has left the club to join League One side Wigan on a season-long loan deal.

title: City's Lewis has CWC ban extended by 2 games
content: Rico Lewis will miss Manchester City's next two games at the Club World Cup after his ban was extended following his red card against Wydad AC.

title: Source: Bar√ßa close in on Roony Bardghji transfer
content: Barcelona are close to completing the signing of Copenhagen FC winger Roony Bardghji, a source has told ESPN.

content: Enzo Maresca said Chelsea are not under any financial pressure to lift the Club World Cup despite the ¬£97million on offer to the winner.

title: Sources: Milan's Hern√°ndez nears Al Hilal move
content: Saudi Pro League club Al Hilal are in advanced negotiations with AC Milan to sign Theo Hern√°ndez for a fee close to ‚Ç¨30 million ($34.6m), sources have told ESPN.

title: Poch awed by U.S. leader Tillman: 'What a player'
content: United States manager Mauricio Pochettino said he was pleased to see his team deliver a "professional performance" in defeating Haiti 2-1 in the Concacaf Gold Cup.

title: Jets owner Johnson agrees to buy Palace stake
content: New York Jets owner Woody Johnson has agreed on a ¬£190 million deal ($254m) to buy a 43% stake in Premier League team Crystal Palace from American businessman John Textor, the club announced on Monday.

title: USMNT completes 'perfect' group stage that was anything but
content: Mauricio Pochettino's USMNT made it three-for-three in the Gold Cup group stage, but there is clearly plenty still to work on for the Americans.

title: 2025-26 NBA Championship odds: Thunder open as faves ahead of Cavs, Knicks
content: Fresh off their first NBA championship, the Oklahoma City Thunder are favorites to repeat next season.

title: Drake Maye marries longtime girlfriend Ann Michael Hudson
content: Maye and Hudson started dating in 2015, with the Patriots quarterback proposing to Hudson in January.

title: Waiver wire: Find someone like Jo Adell?
content: Todd Zola outlines the players you should be claiming off the waiver wire. Rumor has it you should be looking at the Angels outfield.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United linked with Kean swoop
content: Manchester United want to sign a striker and are looking at Fiorentina's Moise Kean. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: US-Iran tensions: Iran launches missiles at US base in Qatar - top developments
content: Iran launched six missiles at the US-operated Al Udeid Air Base in Qatar, causing explosions across Doha and Lusail. This attack, confirmed by Iranian state TV, followed Qatar's airspace closure and recent US-Israeli strikes on Iranian nuclear facilities. While no immediate casualties were reported, embassies urged citizens to stay indoors as regional tensions escalate.

title: New US Visa rule: F, M, & J visa applicants to change privacy setting on FB, Instagram
content: The US embassy in India has announced that applicants for F, M, and J non-immigrant visas must now make their social media accounts public. This new guideline aims to help U.S. officials verify the identity and eligibility of visa applicants during the security screening process. The embassy stated this change is necessary to facilitate vetting and establish admissibility under U.S.

title: KL Rahul didn't just bat with Rishabh Pant ‚Äî he watched over him, like an elder brother would
content: With their own means and ways, the two drove India into a position of control. KL Rahul continued to be patient, calm and left the ball as well as anyone has in this part of the world. Rishabh Pant, meanwhile, entered a period of self-talking where he calmed himself to weather the early storm and then returned to maverick ways before making timely returns to sensibility.

title: Elon Musk‚Äôs simple life: World‚Äôs richest says will never own 5 things
content: Elon Musk, despite his immense wealth, maintains a surprisingly minimalist lifestyle. He sold numerous properties, opting for a small Boxabl home and even crashing at friends' places. Musk once lived on $1 a day and famously crashed a McLaren, never replacing it, showcasing his detachment from luxury possessions and focus on his ventures.

title: 'She's heartbroken': Blake Lively breaks down as Taylor Swift cuts ties
content: The friendship between Blake Lively and Taylor Swift has ended. Sources say Lively is heartbroken after Swift cut ties. Legal issues involving Justin Baldoni's case add complexity. Lively must submit texts with Swift. Rumors suggest Lively tried to leverage her Swift connection. Travis Kelce supports Swift during this difficult time. Swift's upcoming album may reflect themes of betrayal.

title: 'No threat to brotherly Qatar': Iran says used same bomb count as US
content: In a retaliatory move, Iran targeted a US base in Qatar on Sunday evening, following America's alliance with Israel in the conflict against Tehran. Iran's security body declared that the attack mirrored the scale of US strikes on Iranian nuclear sites. Reuters reported the base's location away from Qatari urban and residential zones.

title: Surprise: How Bill Gates, Melinda Gates reacted; when daughter announced her startup
content: Phoebe Gates, daughter of Bill Gates, has launched Phia, an e-commerce app co-founded with Sophia Kianni. The platform utilizes AI to compare prices across numerous websites, offering users a comprehensive view of both new and second-hand fashion items. Bill Gates initially expressed concern about potential financial requests and involvement but ultimately supported Phoebe's entrepreneurial endeavor.

title: 'Two good': Sanjiv Goenka lauds Pant's aggression, gives special mention to KL Rahul
content: Lucknow Super Giants owner Sanjiv Goenka lauded Rishabh Pant and KL Rahul for their centuries against England at Headingley. Pant became the second wicketkeeper ever to score centuries in both innings of a Test, while Rahul hit a patient 137.

title: IND vs ENG: 'You just let Pant be Pant' - Rahul hails star batter after twin tons
content: At Headingley, KL Rahul and Rishabh Pant's spectacular centuries powered India to a formidable 364 in their second innings, setting England a challenging 371-run target. Pant's twin centuries etched his name in history, while Rahul's composed innings anchored the batting display. Despite a late collapse, India's dominant performance has set the stage for a thrilling final day.

title: Former India spinner Dilip Doshi passes away at 77
content: Former Indian left-arm spinner Dilip Doshi passed away in London at the age of 77 due to cardiac arrest. Doshi represented India in 33 Tests and 15 ODIs between 1979 and 1983. The Saurashtra Cricket Association mourned the loss of Doshi, remembering his dedication and skill. He was a match-winner, achieving 114 Test wickets and 898 first-class wickets.

title: BJP MLA supporters assault passenger over window seat - watch video
content: Supriya Shrinate, a Congress leader, has made accusations against Rajeev Singh, a BJP MLA. She alleges he orchestrated an assault on a train passenger. The incident reportedly occurred on the New Delhi‚ÄìBhopal Vande Bharat Express. The dispute arose over a window seat. The Uttar Pradesh BJP has issued a show cause notice to Singh. He is asked to provide a written explanation. Singh claims the co-passenger misbehaved with his family.

title: Trump in situation room: US monitoring Iran strike on base in Qatar, says White House - Report
content: Following Iran's missile strike on Al Udeid Air Base in Qatar, President Trump is in the Situation Room with Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth and General John Caine. The team is actively monitoring the escalating situation as tensions rise in the Gulf region.

title: Ayatollah So: How Donald Trump helped Iran supreme leader reclaim the narrative
content: American B-2 bombers attacked Iranian nuclear facilities at Fordo, Natanz, and Isfahan. Donald Trump claimed complete obliteration of Iran's nuclear infrastructure. Israel followed with strikes on missile sites. The attack strengthened the Iranian regime. It reignited anti-American sentiment. Experts fear Iran may accelerate its pursuit of nuclear weapons. Global oil prices surged amid wider conflict fears.

title: Shashi Tharoor calls PM Modi 'prime asset'; hails his 'energy, dynamism'
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor praised Prime Minister Modi's energy and global engagement as a key asset for India, even as his own party criticizes the government's foreign policy. Tharoor highlighted the success of diplomatic outreach following 'Operation Sindoor,' emphasizing national unity and clear communication.

title: Pant-astic: Rishabh makes history - 1st Indian keeper with 100s in both innings
content: Rishabh Pant etched his name in history by becoming the first Indian wicketkeeper to score centuries in both innings of a Test match. Pant's remarkable feat occurred on Day 4 against England at Headingley, marking his eighth Test century.

title: Will ‚Äòworld chicken out‚Äô? What happens to Trump‚Äôs tariffs after US attack on Iran
content: Following US strikes on Iran's nuclear facilities and ongoing tensions, global markets are reassessing Donald Trump's willingness to act decisively. The previous assumption that Trump would back down from threats, particularly regarding tariffs, is now in question. The economic impact hinges on Iran's response, with potential scenarios ranging from global cooperation to a full-blown trade war and recession.

title: Inside Trump‚Äôs war room: How 'Op Midnight Hammer' against Iran was planned
content: President Trump authorized a high-precision military strike on Iranian nuclear facilities, marking a significant escalation in US-Iran tensions. The operation, executed by B-2 stealth bombers, followed stalled diplomatic talks and a firm ultimatum from Trump regarding Iran's nuclear program. The decision, made amidst internal deliberations and political considerations, represents a sharp departure from previous US policy, with uncertain regional consequences.

title: 'Kept Sanjay out of discussions': Indira Gandhi‚Äôs principal secretary in new book
content: In a significant blow to Kerala's ruling LDF, the UDF secured victory in the Nilambur assembly bypoll, marking the first loss of a sitting seat for the LDF during its current term. Congress candidate Aryadan Shoukath defeated CPI(M)'s M Swaraj by a margin of 11,077 votes.

title: IND vs ENG: Gavaskar calls for Pant's signature somersault celebration, wicketkeeper politely declines - WATCH
content: Rishabh Pant etched his name in history at Headingley, becoming the first wicketkeeper-batter to score centuries in both innings of a Test. His second innings ton was followed by Sunil Gavaskar playfully urging him to repeat his first-innings somersault celebration. Pant's adaptability was also on display, shifting from aggressive shots to a defensive approach, earning praise from Deep Dasgupta.

title: ITR FY25: What's the exemption limit - who still needs to file?
content: Filing income tax returns for FY 2024-25 is necessary if taxable income exceeds ‚Çπ3 lakh (new regime) or ‚Çπ2.5 lakh (old regime). Mandatory filing also applies to high-value transactions like large deposits, foreign travel expenses, or high electricity bills.

title: Adin Ross returns with Brand Risk 008: Date, full fight card revealed
content: Adin Ross is set to host Brand Risk 008 in Nashville on June 22, 2025, featuring a main event between Charleston White and Kodiyakredd. The event, streamed live on Kick, includes nine influencer matchups with personalities like Scam Likely, Julian Newman, and Supreme Patty. Following a chaotic Brand Risk 007, expect more drama and unexpected moments.

title: Jersey number 0: Is it cursed? Fans can‚Äôt get over insane theory after Haliburton‚Äôs injury
content: Tyrese Haliburton's injury in the NBA Game 7 finals, resulting in a loss for the Indiana Pacers against the OKC Thunder, has sparked a bizarre theory. Fans are pointing out a possible 'jersey number 0 curse,' noting similarities between Haliburton's Achilles injury and those of Damian Lillard and Jayson Tatum, who also wear the same number.

title: 'I am watching': Trump asks 'everyone' to keep oil prices down
content: Amidst the Israel-Iran conflict and US airstrikes on Iranian nuclear facilities, oil prices experienced volatility, initially surging before stabilizing. Donald Trump cautioned against escalating prices, fearing it would benefit adversaries. Market anxieties persist due to potential disruptions in global oil supply via the Strait of Hormuz, impacting stock markets worldwide.

title: End of cybercrime? How ISRO and DRDO are building India‚Äôs unhackable network
content: India is making significant strides in quantum communication, driven by ISRO and DRDO innovations. These advancements aim to create unbreakable encryption for data, banking, and health records. The nation's three-level quantum strategy combines fibre optics, free-space, and satellite-based QKD to secure communications across various distances, positioning India as a key player in the global quantum race.

title: Watch: 'Bengaluru masterpiece' tower in the middle of the road goes viral
content: A video of a high-tension electric tower standing in the middle of a Bengaluru road near Hebbal has gone viral, sparking amusement and criticism online. The unusual placement has ignited discussions about urban planning and infrastructure development in the city. While some find humour in the situation, others point to potential issues of corruption or oversight in the planning process.

title: IND vs ENG Test | 'Monk at work' - KL Rahul slams 9th Test century
content: KL Rahul exhibited resilience and skill, scoring his ninth Test century and third in England at Headingley. His composed, unbeaten innings, featuring 13 boundaries, helped India extend their lead after an early setback with Shubman Gill's dismissal. Rahul's landmark innings builds upon his previous centuries at the Oval and Lord's, solidifying his reputation as a formidable overseas Test batter.

title: Middle East crisis: Supertankers making U-turns near Strait of Hormuz
content: Following US military strikes on Iran, tensions in the Middle East are disrupting global energy supplies, as evidenced by supertankers rerouting near the Strait of Hormuz. This critical chokepoint, responsible for a significant portion of oil and gas shipments, faces potential closure threats, causing oil prices to surge and prompting shippers to adopt cautious strategies amid escalating geopolitical risks.

title: "Will Respond Again In Case...": Iran Warns US After Attack On Qatar Base
content: Iran's Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi said on Monday that Tehran's attack on U.S military base al-Udeid in Qatar came in response to the U.S. "aggression against Iran's territorial integrity and sovereignty."

title: Man Kills Friend Over Suspected Affair With Wife In Noida, Arrested: Cops
content: A man was arrested for allegedly killing his friend, suspecting him of having an affair with his wife, police said on Monday.

title: "Thank You For Giving Early Notice": Trump After Iran Targets US Air Base
content: US President Donald Trump signalled today that Iran's attempted air strike at the US-run Al Udeid air base in Qatar would not draw a retaliation from Washington.

title: Iran Attacks US Air Base: What We Know So Far
content: Iran launched missiles toward America's Al-Udeid base in Qatar today in response to the US strikes on the nuclear facilities of Tehran. The Iranian Armed Forces said the base was targeted with a powerful missile attack in Operation Beshararat Fatah.

title: Israel-Iran War LIVE Updates: "14 Missiles Fired, 13 Knocked Down, 1 Set Free": Trump On Iran's Attack
content: US-Israel-Iran Conflict LIVE Updates: The United States carried out a "very successful attack" on three nuclear sites in Iran, President Donald Trump said.

title: Iran Considers Suspending Cooperation With Nuclear Watchdog IAEA
content: Tehran is considering suspending its cooperation with the International Atomic Energy Agency, the speaker of Iran's parliament said Monday.

title: Kuwait, Iraq, UAE, Bahrain, Qatar Shut Airspace As Iran Attacks US Air Base
content: Airlines were on fresh alert late on Monday after Qatar, Bahrain, UAE, Iraq, and Kuwait closed their countries' airspace temporarily as Iran attacked the Al Udeid US military base in Doha, the latest upheaval to air travel in the Middle East.

title: Air India Cancels All Flights Over Gulf After Iran Targets US Base In Qatar
content: Air India has cancelled all its flights over the Gulf region until further notice, hours after Iran launched a missile attack on the US air base in Doha. It had earlier cancelled one of its Qatar flights scheduled from Cochin.

title: Actor Srikanth Sent To Judicial Custody Till July 7 In Drugs Case
content: Popular Tamil and Telugu film actor Srikanth has been remanded to judicial custody till July 7 by a Chennai court in connection with a cocaine-related case.

title: Multiple Global Airlines Disrupted As Middle East Tensions Rise
content: Global airlines have suspended or reduced flights in the Middle East as the conflict between Israel and Iran rages after the United States bombed three Iranian nuclear enrichment sites at the weekend.

title: 2 Dalit Men Forced To Crawl, Eat Grass Over Cattle Smuggling Suspicion: Odisha Police
content: Two Dalit men in Odisha's Ganjam district were half-tonsured, assaulted and forced to crawl on their knees and consume grass on suspicion of cattle smuggling, police claimed on Monday.

title: Noida Man Heading To Airport Dies As Cab Driver "Falls Asleep": Family
content: A man from Noida has died allegedly after the driver of the cab he had booked fell asleep and the car rammed a stationary tempo, the family has alleged.

title: Iran Threat "To Whole World", Says Israel After US Base Attacked In Qatar
content: The Israeli military said Monday that Iran's retaliatory attack on US military bases proved that the country was a threat to "the entire world".

title: Passengers, Crew On Air India's London-Mumbai Flight Fall Sick
content: As many as five passengers and two crew members on board an Air India flight from London fell sick on Monday when the aircraft was on its way to Mumbai, the Tata Group-owned airline said.

title: "Irrelevant", Says Marco Rubio On Whether Iran Was Building Nuclear Weapon
content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio has defended President Donald Trump's decision to target Iran's three nuclear facilities despite intelligence and the International Atomic Energy Agency assessment that Tehran was in no position to have weapons.

title: No Casualties Reported In Iran Missile Attack On US Base In Qatar
content: There was no Iranian attack detected at any U.S. military base other than in Qatar, a U.S. military official told Reuters on Monday.

title: WhatsApp Banned On US House Of Representatives Devices: Memo
content: Meta Platforms' WhatsApp messaging service has been banned on all US House of Representatives devices, according to a memo sent to House staff on Monday.

title: Iran Releases Video Claiming Hit On US' Al Udeid Base In Qatar
content: A video, reportedly released by Iran, shows the moment Tehran launched a missile to strike a US air base in neighbouring Qatar in response to the American strikes on its nuclear facilities.

title: Watch: The Moment When Iranian Missile Was Intercepted Over Doha
content: Chilling visuals of an Iranian ballistic missile being intercepted over the skies of Doha emerged moments after Tehran launched strikes at the Al-Udeid base in Qatar.

title: US President Donald Trump In Situation Room As Iran Attacks US Base In Mid-East
content: US President Donald Trump is in the situation room of the White House as Iran launched attack on the US base in Qatar two days after the US offensive on Iranian nuclear enrichment sites.

title: Grading the Flyers, Ducks on the Trevor Zegras trade
content: the Anaheim Ducks traded Trevor Zegras to the Philadelphia Flyers . he is a two-time 20-goal scorer who has also authored a pair of consecutive 60-point seasons . the Flyers finished 24th in goals per game .

title: Cheryl Miller, Russell Wilson, Azzi Fudd headline sightings at WNBA games this week
content: the celebrity rows at WNBA games have continued to pop off this season . on Juneteenth, the reigning national champion UConn Huskies women's basketball team made the trip down from Storrs to support former teammate Paige Bueckers .

title: Fantasy: How Haliburton's injury impacts Pacers
content: the Pacers could see the biggest shift in fantasy value for 2025-26 . in eight games without Haliburton this past season, Nembhard averaged 11.3 points, 2.6 rebounds and 6.6 assists . his 28.9 minutes per game in 2024-25 was a career high for the third-year pro out of Gonzaga .

title: Delap: Cole Palmer convinced me to join Chelsea
content: Cole Palmer helped convince him to join the club this summer . the 22-year-old attracted interest from a host of clubs including manchester united , Nottingham Forest and Newcastle . delap and Palmer played in the same youth team at Manchester City in 2020-21 .

content: Oklahoma City won the 2025 NBA Finals against the Pacers . it didn't matter that the league's Most Valuable Player, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, was living up to the award's billing . the Thunder won their 17th season in the Sooner State . he drove a 3-pointer at the top of the key .
